snippet: Stocks on Wall Street closed lower as officials in Washington remained at loggerheads over how to solve a budget crisis that has raised fears of a debt default.
lead_paragraph: Stocks on Wall Street closed lower as officials in Washington remained at loggerheads over how to solve a budget crisis that has raised fears of a debt default.

headline.main: Markets Slide as Fiscal Crisis Drags On
headline.print_headline: Markets Slide as Fiscal Crisis Drags On
